short.es: Recopilación definitiva de 35 años de Megadeth; 35 canciones remasterizadas.
short.en: Definitive compilation of 35 years of Megadeth; 35 remastered songs.

extended.es: La recopilación más completa de la carrera de Megadeth, abarcando 35 años de música con 35 canciones cuidadosamente seleccionadas. Incluye clásicos remasterizados desde 'Killing Is My Business' hasta 'Dystopia', presentando la evolución musical de la banda a través de sus mejores momentos.
extended.en: The most comprehensive compilation of Megadeth's career, spanning 35 years of music with 35 carefully selected songs. Features remastered classics from 'Killing Is My Business' to 'Dystopia', showcasing the band's musical evolution through their finest moments.

tracks.title: Killing Is My Business... And Business Is Good!

short.es: Antología de 2 CDs abarcando los primeros 20 años; incluye rarezas y B-sides.
short.en: 2-CD anthology spanning the first 20 years; includes rarities and B-sides.

extended.es: Completa antología que documenta las primeras dos décadas de la carrera de Megadeth, desde 1985 hasta 2005. Incluye no solo los éxitos más conocidos sino también rarezas, versiones alternativas y B-sides que raramente aparecían en recopilaciones, ofreciendo una perspectiva más profunda del catálogo de la banda.
extended.en: Complete anthology documenting the first two decades of Megadeth's career, from 1985 to 2005. Includes not only the best-known hits but also rarities, alternative versions and B-sides that rarely appeared on compilations, offering a deeper perspective on the band's catalog.

tracks.title: Go to Hell
tracks.lyrics:
Now I lay me down to sleep
I pray the Lord my soul to keep
If I die before I wake
I pray the Lord my soul to take

I'm not going to wake up today
They've pulled my plug, the picture fades
And as my body decays, mold begins to fill my grave
The smell of death permeates the silk within my coffin lays
Go to hell

As they bury me now six feet there my body lies
Still feel like I'm going down, I hear a distant wailing cry
God, something must've gone wrong
And much too late I realize
Go to hell

I saw my funeral that day
I know who didn't show to mourn
My judgment was life in hell
Pillars of pain and thorns
My only friend's the goat
With 666 between his horns
Go to hell

Place all your trust here in me
Rest assured these things I know
And as Charon sails the sea
Your journey too shall end below
Ah, yes, you're all sitting ducks
It's true you reap what you sow
Go to hell

Now I lay me down to sleep
Blah, blah, blah, my soul to keep
If I die before I wake
I'll go to hell for heaven's sake

tracks.title: Crown of Worms (Demo Version)
tracks.lyrics:
I am the author, dream up your pain
Drink as did Bacchus, rebel just like Cain
Lord of the city, I shall remain
All pandemonium, I shall reign

Sit in my fortress, up on my hill
Drinking the wine 'til I've had my fill
Building up high, my castle walls
Oh, to veil my splendid fall

I present you, I present to you
I present you this crown of worms

Surrounding myself with misery
Drawn curtains heavy of my history
Exquisite I am, perfect unity
On my left hand is false majesty

I feign affection, refute the true story
Dispute with creation, the lie is my glory
I care for no one, my gospel is death
For me the light's gone, only darkness is left

I present you, I present to you
I present you this crown of worms

As black in deed, as cold as stone
A commandment of one, as proud as gold
As neglected in spirit, as time is old
As legion is numbers, as legend is told

I am alone with the agony of truth
My power of will, my judgement and chain
My end is knowledge and conscience of guilt
My final confusion hidden from me 'til I'm done

I present you, I present to you
I present you this crown of worms

tracks.title: New World Order
tracks.lyrics:
The writing's on the wall, the signs are all around
The world is breaking down, without a single sound
No news is good news, good news is a lie
The truth is buried in the sand, by the powers that deny

New World Order is here to stay
New World Order will make you pay
New World Order, it rules the world
New World Order, a flag unfurled

They got you on your knees, they got you in their web
They pull the strings and watch you dance until you drop dead
They got the control, they got the final say
They got the world in their hands, they lead you all astray

New World Order is here to stay
New World Order will make you pay
New World Order, it rules the world
New World Order, a flag unfurled

Breakdown!

New World Order is here to stay
New World Order will make you pay
New World Order, it rules the world
New World Order, a flag unfurled

They got you on your knees
They pull the strings and watch you dance
They got the control
They got the world in their hands

tracks.title: Kill The King
tracks.lyrics:
Broken down, feeling naked
Leaving me unfulfilled
Promising compromise
Championing mediocrity
Time and time again
What you said ain't what you mean

Even if all my bones are broken
I will drag myself back from the edge to
Kill the King, the King is dead, long live the King
Kill the King, the King is dead, long live the King
I am the King, God save the King

Kill the King, the King is dead
I am the King, long live the King
Kill the King, the King is dead
I am the King, long live the King

I reveal a deceiver
In the highest seat in the land
His idle hands the devil's workshop
Generate more smoke than heat
Time and time again
What you said ain't what you mean

Even if all my bones are broken
I will drag myself back from the edge to
Kill the King, the King is dead, long live the King
I am the King, God save the King

A new precedent in pain, a new precedent in pain
Mankind is blown to dust, mankind is blown to dust
An explosion of the brain, an explosion of the brain
Spontaneously combust, spontaneously combust

Kill the King, the King is dead, long live the King
I am the King

Kill the King, the King is dead, long live the King
I am the King

short.es: Box set de 4 CDs con material raro, demos y versiones en vivo inéditas.
short.en: 4-CD box set with rare material, demos and unreleased live versions.

extended.es: Extenso box set de cuatro discos que reúne material raro y poco conocido de la carrera de Megadeth. Incluye demos, grabaciones en vivo inéditas, versiones alternativas y material de archivo que los fanáticos más dedicados habían estado esperando. Una verdadera joya para coleccionistas.
extended.en: Extensive four-disc box set gathering rare and little-known material from Megadeth's career. Includes demos, unreleased live recordings, alternative versions and archival material that the most dedicated fans had been waiting for. A true gem for collectors.

tracks.title: One Thing
tracks.lyrics:
One Thing that I got for you
Is the One Thing that you never do
One Thing makes you feel brand new
Is the One Thing that you're coming to
Just the One Thing gets you in the mood

You call my number in the middle of the night
To tell me nothing else can make you feel alright
But it rings, you hang it up
And call me back again

One Thing that I got for you
Is the One Thing that you never do
One Thing that you've got to choose
Is the One Thing you can never lose
Just the One Thing that fits your attitude

You call my name in the middle of the night
When you're making love and it feels alright
But it's him, not me, can't you see
A shot of reality

I know what you're doing
I know what you want to do
I know when the lights go out
I know what you are gonna to do

One Thing that I got for you
Is the One Thing you never do
Just the One Thing that gets you in the mood
Just the One Thing that fits your attitude

One Thing is scorning pain
Just the One Thing

title: Greatest Hits: Back to the Start
label: Capitol

short.es: Compilación de grandes éxitos con dos canciones nuevas; retrospectiva definitiva.
short.en: Greatest hits compilation with two new songs; definitive retrospective.

extended.es: Recopilación definitiva de los mayores éxitos de Megadeth hasta 2005, incluyendo dos canciones nuevas grabadas específicamente para esta compilación. Presenta una cuidadosa selección cronológica que muestra la evolución de la banda desde sus inicios thrash hasta su sonido más melódico de los 2000.
extended.en: Definitive compilation of Megadeth's greatest hits up to 2005, including two new songs recorded specifically for this compilation. Features a careful chronological selection that shows the band's evolution from their thrash beginnings to their more melodic sound of the 2000s.

short.es: Compilación de regreso tras el hiatus; incluye clásicos remasterizados y rarezas.
short.en: Comeback compilation after hiatus; includes remastered classics and rarities.

extended.es: Compilación especial lanzada durante el regreso de Megadeth tras el hiatus forzado por los problemas de salud de Dave Mustaine. Incluye versiones remasterizadas de clásicos junto con rarezas y grabaciones poco conocidas, marcando el renacimiento de la banda en la década de 2000.
extended.en: Special compilation released during Megadeth's comeback after the hiatus forced by Dave Mustaine's health problems. Includes remastered versions of classics along with rarities and little-known recordings, marking the band's rebirth in the 2000s decade.

tracks.title: Time: The Beginning / Use the Man (Live)

short.es: Compilación de los años Capitol; últimos éxitos antes del hiatus temporal.
short.en: Capitol years compilation; last hits before temporary hiatus.

extended.es: Compilación que reúne los mejores momentos de Megadeth durante sus años en Capitol Records, desde 'Countdown to Extinction' hasta 'Risk'. Esta colección captura la transición de la banda hacia un sonido más comercial y accesible, siendo el último lanzamiento antes del hiatus temporal por los problemas de salud de Mustaine.
extended.en: Compilation gathering Megadeth's best moments during their Capitol Records years, from 'Countdown to Extinction' to 'Risk'. This collection captures the band's transition toward a more commercial and accessible sound, being the last release before the temporary hiatus due to Mustaine's health problems.
